title: Policy Changes and Financial Issues Drove November Cuts
description:
Policy Changes and Financial Issues Drove November Cuts

 


 
Josh Moody

Wed, 12/03/2025 - 03:00 AM

Universities across the nation announced job and program cuts last month. Most were related to persistent financial challenges, though some stem from federa…
content:
Multiple public and private universities announced job and program cuts, as well as other money-saving measures, last month in response to financial challenges driven by a range of factors.
